The game has enough depth to keep you interested and is definitely not a "horror" game after a couple of hours in. The only downside is that you basically have to unlock valid perks for your survivor/killer through other characters which you probably won't even play, taking a lot of time.

If you are looking for a game in this genre, there's no equal as far as I know. 

8/10 would immerse again

This has been my favourite game for so long. I don't usually rage at a game but the matchmaking and the killers that I have been going up against have really been crossing the line with the amount of camping and tunneling I've seen. Sometimes there are glimmers of hope but they're quite the rarity. I despise this game but will continue to play it regardless...

The match making was already bad enough already, and they some how made it even worse with "skill based match making" that doesn't even function correctly. I admit, i'm not good at the game, so why am I being paired with high ranking players that put thousands of hours into this game, when i have only put a few hours and am just not good at the game at all. this skill based match making is a joke and whoever coded it should really fix it because it's just not good. The game is alright, but not very new player friendly. Like at all. The players in the game are no better. Toxic match making paired with toxic players. All in all, the game is kinda garbage and again, the coding for the skill based match making is a literal joke. I've seen high schoolers code better than this dumpster fire of a game.

Where to Start....

1) Every Update, you need to Fully Download the Game Again
2) 99% of the Killers are Broken beyond Repair
3) The Community Managers only Listen to Killer Whines to Buff Them even More
4) 99% of the Time you Encounter Camping, Tunneling, Focusing, Toxic Killers
5) Most Survivors are kinda Useless
6) Not fully Optimized
7) When the Killer has Bad Connection, has Advantage
8) You tend to only see the same Killers over and Over and Over
9) Team Play is so Poorly Designed
10) Awfull Matchmaking, taking 10 to 15 Minutes to Find a Match or Gets you paired with Tier 1 Killers as your are a begginer
11) Got a Mathc Rating feature, doesn´t do nothing or matters whatsoever
12) Got a Report System, they don´t even pay attention to it.
13) Every new killer is just awfull to play against, most of them, as i said before, are broken with Op features.
14) This game has you use the same Button fro 3 to 5 different things. (Repair, Vaulting, Getting rid of Chains, Healing) (Not a good key maping)
15) NFT´s

Good Thing...

1) You get to enjoy being a Psycopathic Maniac all powerfull while being a Killer, but it isnt that enjoyable to be honest.

UPDATE:
5 Years of the Game, still SO BAD OPTIMIZED, BUGGY and the HITBOXES Jesus, 5 YEARS mind you.
Also NFT´S (It will never be forgotten)

This game was ruined by their MMR system. There is no reward for getting to a high MMR except for playing against the same killers with the same perks. Then, if you play killer you get survivors who actually sweat their asses off and its not fun unless you use those perks hinted at above. Most survivor games for me have played out like so, we get the same lame ass killer I have seen multiple times and someone DC's ruining the game completely, or the killer decided to tunnel 1 person to kill them quickly and make it impossible for the rest of us to win / play. I've put so much time into this game just for it to get ruined by the MMR system and make me want to uninstall it. If I was you with this knowledge, I would wait until the devs (hopefully but unrealistic) remove the MMR system. Thanks for reading my rant, but at the end of the day, if you play this game and actually want to get good at it, then be prepared to run into the same annoying bullshit that never changes. Oh and I forgot to mention, most survivor games I have played have consisted of people killing themselves as soon as possible to lower their MMR. TLDR: The game is shit with MMR and is not worth the time or money.

I bought this game in June of 2018 and invested 2300+ hours of the currently the most played game on my steam. Now I don't want even play killer I got to red rank one on the old ranking system back in April of 2020 and kept it all the way to now .  On survivor side I was in red ranks got up to rank 1 one time and called it good I'm a killer main. Now I want to switch sides and just play survivor with friends not caring if I win or lose because I have friends to chat with. To play killer is pain I'm either against 4 survivors who have more hours then me or I'm against a four man SWF who are in constant communication making it hard to play many killers that I enjoy. Survivor now is nothing but tunnel or camp. I don't play games with skill base match making for a reason they stop being fun, it is only sweat. This game is starting to go down hill and I'm now looking at other games to fill the void of it. I'm now looking at Hellbent Games VHS; I used to think I would never look for another game but this starting to be no fun. If you want to win there is no verity you run meta perks and don't run any fun or unique builds. So in summery this game was fun for a long time, I could bear the bugs, the bad maps, bad teammates, and a lot of other things the Devs would not fix but SBMM is killing the fun for the game.

Ótimo jogo é bom para jogar com os amigos

This game used to require skill for both killers and survivors to succeed. The developers have intentionally stripped killers of all strong perks, add-ons, and offerings whilst adding ever stronger survivor perks and add-ons. In an asymmetrical horror game, the killer is supposed to be stronger however it appears that the developers want the killer to lose to any team demonstrating any sort of coordination. I would recommend players looking for an asymmetrical game to look elsewhere as games from this developer will leave players feeling more frustrated and rueful at their purchase than the joy a game is meant to bring.

I will NEVER play killer and only maybe play in team games with friends in a call. The 2021 MMR BULLSHIT is nothing but sweaty players and campy killers. Even content creators are quitting because the unbalanced match making and as a new player with 31 hours (at time of this review) I'm getting slaughtered with my friends who have 600+ and 2300+ hours in the game. There is no balance. Just pure camp, tunneling and forced sweaty game play by killers just to keep up with survivors. It makes the game un-fun and I will never reccomend this game to anyone. If I play again, its only with friends for us to BS in a call and expect not to win. So we can just hang out and talk because of the shitty balance mechanic that the Dev's dont care about. Their pocket books are more important than their player base. If this game lasts another year with this MMR. I will be honestly shocked. The Dev's deserve what is coming to them with this bloodbath they are doing to their player base.
This game is like Fortnite levels of media cross-overs.
